subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A record number of underclassmen, including Johnny Manziel and Jadeveon Clowney, have made themselves eligible for the N.F.L. draft in May.
snippet: A record number of underclassmen, including Johnny Manziel and Jadeveon Clowney, have made themselves eligible for the N.F.L. draft in May.
